reason: Significant regulatory uncertainty (Senate market structure vote) and direct enforcement actions (Tennessee cease & desist orders) are creating immediate headwinds for the broader crypto market. Vitalik Buterin's warning on decentralized stablecoins adds to the risk narrative for DeFi. While positive Ethereum technical developments (ZK-proofs, Robinhood L2 adoption) provide long-term optimism, they do not negate the immediate regulatory pressure and uncertainty, leading to a period of caution, potential profit-taking, and risk reduction.
headlines: Ethereum co-founder Vitalik Buterin warns decentralized stablecoins still have deep flaws
Ethereum’s future hinges on zero-knowledge proofs, EF director says
Robinhood explains building an Ethereum layer-2: 'We wanted the security from Ethereum'
The Senate moves toward a market structure vote: State of Crypto
Tennessee orders Kalshi, Polymarket and Crypto.com to cease sports betting contracts
